resources.string: The Electronic Government Procurement (e-GP) System of the Royal Government of Bhutan facilitates all Procuring Agencies to publish the Tenders.
By clicking \'JOIN BODDO\' you agree with our Terms and Conditions . Learn about how we process your data in our Privacy Policy.
The Electronic Government Procurement (e-GP) System of the Royal Government of Bhutan facilitates all Procuring Agencies to publish the Tenders.
